extendedInfo.description: This app was created by match directors for match directors to help make their job easier in designing/sharing fun and challenging competitive shooting events match designs for IPSC, SCSA, SASS, IDPA, IDPA-DMG, and USPSA. One of the challenges of being a match director is coming up with match designs that take into account:The shooting discipline rulesRange/equipment limitation for your shooting eventLimitation of time to create/review/execute a match.The hope is with app match directors can more efficiently share challenging designs that benefits the sport and make the whole match experience better for everyone involved from the match director down to the shooter on the line.
